abstract: The Thai oil and gas company PTT Exploration and Production said on Friday that it had submitted a rival $1.7 billion bid for energy exploration Cove Energy, trumping a previous offer from Royal Dutch Shell
snippet: The Thai oil and gas company PTT Exploration and Production said on Friday that it had submitted a rival $1.7 billion bid for energy exploration Cove Energy, trumping a previous offer from Royal Dutch Shell
lead_paragraph: LONDON – The Thai oil and gas company PTT Exploration and Production made a rival bid for Cove Energy, as demand increases for new energy reserves in East Africa.

headline.main: PTT Makes Rival Bid for Cove Energy
